block.p: Dr. Jayde Marya Steckowych and Marty Schenker were married on Thursday at their home in Wyckoff, N.J., where John A. Paparazzo, a municipal judge in Verona, N.J., officiated. Last evening, Kerry Steckowych, a brother of the bride, led a public celebration of the couple's marriage, again at their home.

Dr. Steckowych, 53, is keeping her name. She is an otolaryngologist and a head and neck surgeon in Ramsey, N.J. She graduated from Boston University and received a medical degree from Far Eastern University in Manila. She is a daughter of Thérèse and Peter Steckowych of Goffstown, N.H.

Dr. Jayde Marya Steckowych and Marty Schenker were married on Thursday at their home in Wyckoff, N.J., where John A. Paparazzo, a municipal judge in Verona, N.J., officiated. Last evening, Kerry Steckowych, a brother of the bride, led a public celebration of the couple’s marriage, again at their home.

Dr. Jayde Marya Steckowych and Marty Schenker were married on Thursday at their home in Wyckoff, N.J., where John A. Paparazzo, a municipal judge in Verona, N.J., officiated. Last evening, Kerry Steckowych, a brother of the bride, led a public celebration of the couple's marriage, again at their home.

Dr. Steckowych, 53, is keeping her name. She is an otolaryngologist and a head and neck surgeon in Ramsey, N.J. She graduated from Boston University and received a medical degree from Far Eastern University in Manila. She is a daughter of Thérèse and Peter Steckowych of Goffstown, N.H.
The bridegroom, 57, is a top editor for Bloomberg News in Manhattan and is a Bard College graduate. He is the son of the late Lucille and Hyman Schenker, who lived in Flushing, Queens.
The bride's previous marriage ended in divorce, as did the bridegroom's two previous marriages.
